item.title: About
item.description: Lets pretend you are a real person, and I’ll pretend to introduce myself and impress you (in third person). For your information, I am very much a real person, to prove it, there is a picture of me (seeeee, i am in the left, computer is in the right). $ whoami _ The name is Trim, Trim BRESILLA (pun intended), and he’s currently working as a PostDoc at University of Bologna.
